sample_docs: myQNAPcloud One Beta September Only - Save Big on myQNAPcloud One! → QVR Recording Vault Expanded support for QVR Surveillance and QuTS hero. More flexible, more reliable. → QNAP Dual-NAS High Availability Maximize service uptime with automatic failover → QAI-M100 / QAI-U100 Edge AI Accelerators – Enhancing NAS AI Image Recognition Performance TVR-AI200 16 Channel 4K PoE+ Smart NVR – Designed for Smart Retail Qsync 6.0 Beta Beta One-stop file backup and sync — Back up your PC files and sync across devices to streamline teamwork → myQNAPcloud One Beta Shared cloud storage for NAS backups and scalable S3 object storage. → 2025-09-09 QNAP at IBC2025: Next-gen Storage and Networking to Accelerate Media & Entertainment Workflows Future-ready Network Switches Bolster IT infrastructure with high-speed networking solutions Best storage for Veeam® Backups Securely back up virtual machines and object data to the Veeam-Ready QNAP NAS "QNAP NAS played a vital role in our data digitization process, ensuring the secure preservation of our important information, while its file-sharing features make collaboration more convenient for our colleagues." "QNAP has transformed how we approach genomic data storage and accessibility. It provides enterprise-grade performance at a cost-effective price point, enabling our research team to prioritize scientific discovery over storage management." "By utilizing QNAP's latest hardware, the TS-h1677AXU-RP, we were able to consolidate four units into one, while also future-proofing our storage solution with a substantial upgrade pathway." "VFX work demands massive capacity, ultra-fast access, and seamless workflows. QNAP eliminated our key bottlenecks, enabling our team to focus on creativity. The productivity gains have been remarkable." "We've completely streamlined our workflow—loading films directly onto the NAS and delivering them seamlessly to projectors. No more physical hard drives, no more delays. Everything just works." "QNAP NAS exceeded our expectations. Its powerful performance and flexibility have transformed our IT operations, driving remarkable efficiency." "QNAP's SD-WAN solution has made our network more resilient, efficient, and secure, enabling us to optimize costs and enhance the productivity of our clinics." "Increasing security is one of Jotelulu's strategic pillars. QNAP, through integration, puts us in touch with the local environment and gives us the possibility to continue to contribute in of resilience and business continuity. It is a great opportunity to continue creating value in the IT and SME sector." myQNAPcloud One Beta September Only - Save Big on myQNAPcloud One! → QVR Recording Vault Expanded support for QVR Surveillance and QuTS hero. Our support team is here to assist you with any technical issue every step of the way. QNAP Blog A diverse range of articles help you understand every detail of QNAP products and services. Our QNAP experts give you a more in-depth look into the topics that matter to you. Being able to share storage between systems allows us to work faster and more collaboratively. QNAP NAS provides large storage capacity and features unique SSD technologies to improve system performance. Replacing Windows server with the QNAP NAS result in higher efficiency, security, ease of management and energy cost reduction. In of shooting and editing TV materials, QNAP NAS has the stability and speed needed for a hardware storage device. The QNAP NAS helped make our backup more efficient. Thanks to Qsync, I don't need to worry about backup anymore. We are very satisfied with the performance that QNAP NAS solutions give us. Accessing my images files with Adobe Lightroom has dramatically increased and improved our efficiency at least 25% QNAP is a reliable total solution that enhances video recognition accuracy and data security at the same time. White paper An in-depth guide to technical details of QNAP products and solutions Security Guide Security guide will help users set up the NAS correctly to improve security. Read more Virtual Network Platform Virtual Network Platform Incorporates networking, computing, services and cloud management to achieve resilient virtualized IT room deployment. Read more Boxafe for Google Workspace The comprehensive, reliable and on-premises SaaS backup and recovery solution helps enterprises protect important data on Google Workspace. Read more Boxafe for Microsoft 365 The comprehensive, reliable and on-premises SaaS backup and recovery solution helps enterprises protect important data on Microsoft 365. Read more QuTS hero High-performance ZFS-based operating system with greater reliability. It supports data reduction, SnapSync, QSAL (QNAP SSD Antiwear Leveling), Pool Over-provisioning, and much more enterprise-grade technologies. Read more HybridMount A compact hybrid cloud environment is created using HybridMount with local caching to lower access latency and protocol conversion. Read more Enterprise ZFS NAS The Enterprise ZFS NAS Series uses the ZFS-based QES operating system that provides reliable data protection, recovery, and business-class features to assist businesses in accelerating mission-critical services and tackling the challenges of VDI applications. Read more SED QTS now supports Samsung SED (Self-encrypting Drive) SSDs, allowing you to leverage SSD's built-in encryption functions without installing extra software or using NAS system resources to encrypt your data for an extra layer of data protection. Read more Veeam This white paper highlights best practices for using Veeam with QNAP NAS, in addition to the best ways to leverage Samsung SSDs as part of that formula. Read more SSD Over-provisioning This white paper outlines how QNAP utilizes SSD extra over-provisioning to improve performance and lifespan of SSDs in versatile NAS applications. Read more Virtualization Station This white paper details basic/advanced functions and performance assessments of virtual machines on QNAP NAS for NAS product selection purposes. Read more Snapshots This white paper introduces the snapshot technology implemented in QTS. Read more GDPR This white paper gives an in-depth analysis of GDPR and associated QNAP NAS technologies for legal compliance with GDPR.
